data.name: LoginWrongUsernamePassword
data.value: You could not be logged in! Please check your username and password.

data.name: LoginNoGroups
data.value: No groups could be loaded! Either you have no groups or something went wrong.

data.name: FeedbackDetailsDefault
data.value: Your feedback will be sent to Maxi! You can also, e.g., include links to images.

data.name: FeedbackDetailsError
data.value: Something went wrong unexpectedly! The error has been reported with the ID {0}.

data.name: FeedbackResponseError
data.value: If possible, please enter more details what you did before the error occured here:

data.name: FeedbackEmailDefault
data.value: If you want to possibly be contacted, enter your email address here:

data.name: FeedbackEmailError
data.value: If you want to be notified by email when the error is fixed, enter your email address here:

data.name: LoginExplanation
data.value: Login with your Rollenspielhimmel username and password to get started!

data.name: SelectNoThreadsFor
data.value: No threads could be loaded for group {0}!

data.name: SelectNothingSelected
data.value: You have to select at least one group and one thread!

data.name: ExportMissingFolder
data.value: Please choose an export folder first!

data.name: ExportFolderContainsFiles
data.value: This folder already contains files. Files will be overwritten, if they have the same name. Are you sure that you want to use this folder?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroup
data.value: Include the name of the group at the top?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroupAuthor
data.value: Also include the owner of the group?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroupPostedAt
data.value: Also include when the group was created?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroupUrl
data.value: Also include the URL to the group?

data.name: OptionIncludeThread
data.value: Include the name of the thread at the top?

data.name: OptionIncludeThreadAuthor
data.value: Also include the author of the thread?

data.name: OptionIncludeThreadPostedAt
data.value: Also include when the thread was created?

data.name: OptionIncludeThreadUrl
data.value: Also include the URL to the thread?

data.name: OptionIncludePostAuthor
data.value: Include the author of the posts?

data.name: OptionIncludePostPostedAt
data.value: Include when the post was posted?

data.name: OptionDownloadToOwnFolder
data.value: Download the threads for each group into a separate folder?

data.name: OptionDownloadImagesToOwnFolder
data.value: Download the images for each post into a separate folder?

data.name: OptionIncludeImages
data.value: Export the images of the posts?

data.name: OptionDownloadImages
data.value: Download the images of the posts?

data.name: OptionReserveOrder
data.value: Reverse the order of the posts (newest to oldest instead of oldest to newest)?

data.name: ExportMissingFileFormat
data.value: Please choose at least one export file format!

data.name: LoginSubtitle
data.value: Quickly and easily export and backup your Rollenspielhimmel groups, threads and posts!

data.name: ExportCancelExport
data.value: Do you want to cancel the export?

data.name: ExportExportCancelled
data.value: The export was cancelled. Some files may have already been exported.
